description: A responsible essential unisex crewneck sweatshirt made of 100% Regenerative Organic Certified™ cotton from farms working toward the highest organic standard, which aims to rehabilitate soil, respect animal welfare and improve the lives of farmers. These practices reduce greenhouse gas emissions and could help trap more carbon than conventional agriculture. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Regenerative Organic Certified Cotton Crewneck Sweatshirt - Unisex

specs.value: 9.4-oz 100% Regenerative Organic Certified™ cotton french terry
8.8-oz 89% Regenerative Organic Certified™ cotton, 11% spandex rib knit
